introductions: I'm a software engineer specialized in frontend and backend development for complex scalable web apps. I also write codes as a tool for productivity.
I'm a lifelong learner and i have a great enthusiasm to learn new technologies and to write codes that is clean and extensible
My goal is to enhance further my skills by means of sharing my knowledge and experiences with my fellow software engineers through this site. I hope you like the aesthetics of my site thak you. :)
whatIdo: I do software programming mainly on web application from frontend to backend and have more than 7 years of experience in building software from prototyping to production. Here are the quick overview of my main technical skill sets and technologies i already used.
